message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1200000.  It's a significant investment, but I believe it's a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.  Let me know what you think!

I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $900000 doesn't quite cover the value I've placed on this product.  Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to come down to $1000000.  This would still be a great deal for you, and it allows me to make a fair profit.  Let's make this happen.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $1000000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to go a bit higher, but I'm thinking more along the lines of $950000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
